column5: Faint: Give a random friend (+2/+1)/(+4/+2)/(+6/+3).

Moral support
Buy: Copy the Health of the healthiest friend.
Start of battle: Give friend ahead 50%/100%/150% ATK.
Before Attack: Deal 1 damage to 1/2/3 friends behind.
Faint: Give the two friends behind (+1/+1)/(+2/+2)/(+3/+3).
Faint: Deal 2/4/6 dmg to all.
Hurt: Gain 50% of ATK 1/2/3 times.
Faint: Summon 1/2/3 1/1 Dirty Rats up front for the opponent.

Faint: Summon a lvl 1/2/3 tier 3 pet as 2/2.

Faint: Deal 1x/2x/3x ATK to adjacent pets.

Hurt: Give friend behind (+1/+2)/(+2/+4)/(+3/+6).

Faint: Give 1/2/3 friends behind Melon Armor.

Faint: Summon a (5/5)/(10/10)/(15/15) Bus with Splash Attack.
Start of battle: Deal 5/10/15 dmg to the lowest health enemy.
End turn: Copy ability from friend ahead as lvl 1/2/3 until the end of battle.
End turn: Give other lvl 2 and 3 friends (+1/+1)/(+2/+2)/(+3/+3).

Start of battle: Reduce HP of the highest enemy by 33%/66%/99%.
Start of turn: Discount shop food by 1/2/3 gold.
Start of battle: Swallow friend ahead and release it as lvl 1/2/3 after fainting.
Buy: Replace food shop with free milk that gives (+1/+2)/(+2/+4)/(+3/+6).
Start of battle: Deal 8/16/24 damage to the last enemy.
End turn: Give right-most friend (+2/+3)/(+4/+6)/(+6/+9).
Knockout: Deal 4/8/12 dmg to first enemy.
No ability; has innate Poison Attack.

Multiplies the HP and ATK effect of food by 2/3/4.
